location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Colonel Thomas Matthias Weguelin, Commissary General, Calcutta [Kolkata]

mods.abstract: Letter reports Stephen Watson Henshaw's success in recovering thirty-five bales of the sulphur lost in the wreck of the Ahmed Shah.William Bruce states that the thirty-five bales will be consigned to Weguelin, followed by a further consignment of sulphur.
